name: Hammy (itch) (AlexGuenther)
description:
Hammy

The Life of Hammy the hamster is not easy. Whenever he wakes up, the cocky bird Chucky has stolen some of his precious nuts. Can you help Hammy to gain all the nuts back?

Hammy is a mobile game designed for kids of young age. In the game children memorize the pattern and are required to tap the same pattern afterwards in the correct order. The focus of the game is to train the attention spam and memory capacity of children. However, it is also fun for adults. Just press download and have a try. It might not as easy as it seems.

Developed by: I Chen Lin, Till Holder, Shahriar Shahrabi, Nils Bernatzki, Thomas Otto, Alexander Günther Supported by: Prof. Susanne Brandhorst, Prof. Thomas Bremer, Walther Sänger Created in GAME DESIGN Bachelor Studies, HTW Berlin
